module.name: Sound Languages
module.changelog: *13.0.2* Describe console commands for the normal person *13.0.1* Proper language replacement usage *13.0.0beta6* Standardize look and feel *13.0.0beta5* Start supporting locations (e.g. en_GB) and add a few languages/locations *13.0.0beta3* Fix missing language names when language not already installed *13.0.0beta2* Fix error when no languages installed *13.0.0beta1* Add custom languages *13.0.0alpha1* First release
